summary: Comprehensive testing of Agentic RAG Knowledge Assistant completed successfully. All backend APIs and frontend features working perfectly with 100% success rate. Memory extraction functionality fully operational - agent autonomously extracts facts from conversations and updates memory files. RAG with citations working, weather integration via Open-Meteo operational, 3-pane UI responsive and intuitive.
passed_tests: GET /api/sanity - LLM integration working with Gemini 2.5 Flash
POST /api/upload - Sample document uploaded successfully (2 chunks)
GET /api/documents - Document listing shows 2 indexed files
POST /api/chat (RAG) - Microservices query with 2 citations and 5 reasoning steps
POST /api/chat (Memory) - Data Engineer profile extracted 5 user memories successfully
POST /api/chat (Weather) - Tokyo weather query with Open-Meteo integration
GET /api/memory/user - User memory content (1213 chars) with extracted facts
GET /api/memory-feed - Memory feed with 12 entries (9 user, 3 company)
Frontend 3-pane layout - Knowledge Manager, Chat Panel, Memory Feed all rendering
Upload dropzone - File drop area present and functional
Chat interface - Input field, send button, loading states working
Memory Feed tabs - Feed/User/Org tabs switching correctly
Thought trace - Reasoning steps expandable with proper icons
Citations display - Source references with tooltips working
Memory Feed updates - Real-time updates after memory extraction
Weather UI integration - Weather queries showing detailed responses
Suggestion buttons - Pre-filled prompts working correctly
